# isDecodable

**Type Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the track is decodable in the current environment.

## Declaration

```swift
static var isDecodable: AVAsyncProperty<Root, Bool> { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVAsynchronousKeyValueLoading/load(_:isolation:)] method to retrieve the property value.

When this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true], the system can decode the track, even if decoding may be too slow for real-time playback.

## Loading track information

- **formatDescriptions**: The format descriptions of the media samples that a track references.
- **isPlayable**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the track is playable in the current environment.
- **isEnabled**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the track is in an enabled state.
- **isSelfContained**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the track references sample data only within its container file.
- **totalSampleDataLength**: The total number of bytes of sample data the track requires.
- **mediaCharacteristics**: The media characteristics for the track.
